statements: SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, document_title FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_id, document_title, document_content FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments WHERE document_title LIKE '%policy%';
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments WHERE policy_id = 5;
SELECT policy_id, document_title FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments WHERE document_title LIKE '%health%' AND document_content LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT policy_id, document_title, last_updated FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments ORDER BY last_updated ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM remote_work_documents WHERE document_id = 2;
SELECT employee_name, document_title, upload_date FROM remote_work_documents JOIN employee_access ON remote_work_documents.document_id = employee_access.document_id;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_documents WHERE document_title LIKE '%proposal%';
SELECT document_id, document_content, document_title FROM remote_work_documents WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM remote_work_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_id, document_title FROM remote_work_documents WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM remote_work_documents WHERE document_title LIKE 'Report%';
SELECT * FROM remote_work_documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, document_title FROM employee_access JOIN remote_work_documents ON employee_access.document_id = remote_work_documents.document_id ORDER BY employee_name ASC, upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name, tag_name FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments JOIN DocumentTags ON RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments.document_id = DocumentTags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments ORDER BY upload_date DESC;

SELECT document_name, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments JOIN DocumentRelationships ON RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments.document_id = DocumentRelationships.parent_document_id GROUP BY document_name;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, tag_name FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments JOIN DocumentTags ON RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments.document_id = DocumentTags.tag_id;
SELECT parent_document_id, child_document_id FROM DocumentRelationships WHERE parent_document_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_policies;
SELECT policy_title, created_at FROM remote_work_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT policy_title FROM remote_work_policies WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE manager_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_title, policy_content FROM remote_work_policies WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_id;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, p.policy_title, a.access_time FROM employees e JOIN access_logs a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id JOIN remote_work_policies p ON a.accessed_policy_id = p.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments;
SELECT document_id, document_title, created_by FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT document_title, created_date FROM RemoteWorkPolicyDocuments WHERE created_by = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY join_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE join_date > '2020-01-01' AND join_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department IN ('Engineering', 'Sales') ORDER BY employee_name ASC
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM Employees e JOIN Departments d ON e.department = d.department_name

SELECT e.employee_name, ap.permission_name FROM Employees e JOIN EmployeeAccess ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id JOIN AccessPermissions ap ON ea.permission_id = ap.permission_id WHERE ap.permission_name = 'Read'
